description.plain:
Kristen Anne Bell is an American actress and film producer who has also performed in Broadway in the past.

She gained critical acclaim for her portrayal of the lead and title character in Veronica Mars between 2004 and 2007.

body.plain:
Kristen Anne Bell is an American actress and film producer who has also performed in Broadway in the past.

She gained critical acclaim for her portrayal of the lead and title character in Veronica Mars between 2004 and 2007.

songs.full_title: The Next Right Thing by Kristen Bell
songs.title: The Next Right Thing

description.plain: After Olaf (Josh Gad) melts away in Anna’s (Kristen Bell) arms, she curls up in a cave and almost succumbs to the grief and sadness she feels over the apparent deaths of Olaf and Elsa (Idina Menzel). In the darkest moment of the movie, she searches for the strength to overcome her despair, which is especially difficult, for almost everything she did in her life was for the sake of her sister, Elsa, and with her absence, it seems like nothing can be good again. But, as shown in this song, by relying on the former words of Pabbie (Ciarán Hinds) the troll, to do “the next right thing,“ Anna gathers enough willpower to make her way out of the cave and save her sister.

songs.embed_content: Read “The Next Right Thing” by Kristen Bell on Genius

body.plain: After Olaf (Josh Gad) melts away in Anna’s (Kristen Bell) arms, she curls up in a cave and almost succumbs to the grief and sadness she feels over the apparent deaths of Olaf and Elsa (Idina Menzel). In the darkest moment of the movie, she searches for the strength to overcome her despair, which is especially difficult, for almost everything she did in her life was for the sake of her sister, Elsa, and with her absence, it seems like nothing can be good again. But, as shown in this song, by relying on the former words of Pabbie (Ciarán Hinds) the troll, to do “the next right thing,“ Anna gathers enough willpower to make her way out of the cave and save her sister.

songs.title: 重頭改過 (The Next Right Thing)

songs.full_title: Lo Que Hay Que Hacer by Romina Marroquín Payró
songs.title: Lo Que Hay Que Hacer

songs.full_title: Der nächste Schritt by Pia Allgaier
songs.title: Der nächste Schritt

songs.full_title: Fazer o que é Melhor by Gabi Porto
songs.title: Fazer o que é Melhor

songs.lyrics:
31 ContributorsThe Next Right Thing Lyrics[Verse 1]
I've seen dark before, but not like this
This is cold, this is empty, this is numb
The life I knew is over, the lights are out
Hello, darkness, I'm ready to succumb

[Verse 2]
I follow you around, I always have
But you've gone to a place I cannot find
This grief has a gravity, it pulls me down
But a tiny voice whispers in my mind
"You are lost, hope is gone
But you must go on
And do the next right thing"
[Verse 3]
Can there be a day beyond this night?
I don't know anymore what is true
I can't find my direction, I'm all alone
The only star that guided me was you
How to rise from the floor
When it's not you I'm rising for?
Just do the next right thing
Take a step, step again
It is all that I can to do
The next right thing

[Bridge]
I won't look too far ahead
It's too much for me to take
But break it down to this next breath
This next step
This next choice is one that I can make

[Verse 4]
So I'll walk through this night
Stumbling blindly toward the light
And do the next right thing
And with the dawn, what comes then
When it's clear that everything will never be the same again?
Then I'll make the choice
To hear that voice
And do the next right thingYou might also like3Embed

songs.title: Home (Outtake)

description.plain: This is a song sung by Anna. This song was cut because it felt wrong that the opening number was just Anna, not everyone. This song was eventually replaced by, “Some Things Never Change.”

songs.embed_content: Read “Home (Outtake)” by Kristen Bell on Genius

album.full_title: Холодное сердце 2 (Оригинальный саундтрек / Делюкс версия) (Frozen 2 Russian Original Motion Picture Soundtrack Deluxe) by Walt Disney Records
album.name: Холодное сердце 2 (Оригинальный саундтрек / Делюкс версия) (Frozen 2 Russian Original Motion Picture Soundtrack Deluxe)

body.plain: This is a song sung by Anna. This song was cut because it felt wrong that the opening number was just Anna, not everyone. This song was eventually replaced by, “Some Things Never Change.”

songs.lyrics:
18 ContributorsHome (Outtake) Lyrics[Verse 1]
I smell that salty breeze blowing through the fjord
I hear those creaky ships as old board meets old board
I breathe in the place I live and wonder what else can I give this home
My home

[Verse 2]
Wandering through the town with everyone doing all of their stuff
Somewhere in my heart I feel I've not yet done enough
For these people I know, this place that I love so
My home
My home
[Verse 3]
I whistle as I walk, a lovely smell of kransekake
Wafting out of the baker’s door
The merchants haggling over fish remind me I have what I wish
'Cause I'm not alone anymore

[Bridge]
I’m grateful for this castle
And for everything we've got
Especially my family
We've all been through a lot
I know how fragile things can be
If I lost them, I'd lose me
They're my ocean, they're my shore
I wanna give them more
They're my home
My home

[Verse 4]
Bless this happiness we found
Bless this good and solid ground
Our home
Our home

[Outro]
(Our home
Our home
Our home
Our home
Our home
Our home
Our home)
I'm homeYou might also likeEmbed
